fields.title: Your Dashboard: The Heart of Your Journey
fields.description: Your personalized command center that transforms your daily data into meaningful insights.
fields.content:
## Why Your Dashboard Matters

Your Dashboard isn't just a home pageâ€”it's **your personal life intelligence center**. Every journal entry, health measurement, prayer, and task you log feeds into this view to give you:

- **Patterns you can't see yourself** - The AI notices trends across weeks and months
- **Timely nudges** - Gentle reminders when you're drifting from your intentions
- **Celebrations** - Recognition of progress that keeps you motivated
- **Action items** - What needs your attention today, prioritized by what matters most

### How Your Data Becomes Insight

When you log a journal entry, the AI analyzes your mood patterns. When you track your weight, it notices trends. When you complete tasks, it learns your productivity rhythms. **The more you use Whole Life Journey, the smarter your Dashboard becomes.**

---

## Dashboard Components

### Quick Stats (Top Row)
Clickable tiles showing your current status:
- **Journal Streak** ðŸ”¥ - Consecutive days of journaling (click to see entries)
- **Tasks Today** âœ“ - Today's task count (click to manage tasks)
- **Active Prayers** ðŸ™ - Open prayer requests (click to view)
- **Medicine Doses** ðŸ’Š - Today's medications (click to track)
- **Workouts This Week** ðŸ’ª - Weekly exercise count (click to log more)

### Today's Insight
An AI-generated observation personalized to your coaching style. This isn't generic adviceâ€”it's based on YOUR recent activity, mood patterns, and goals.

### Celebrations
Recognition of your wins, big and small. Completing a 7-day journal streak? Hitting your protein goal? We celebrate progress here.

### Accountability Nudges
Gentle reminders about:
- Goals you set but haven't worked on
- Habits that have slipped
- Medicines that need refills
- Tasks that are overdue

### Today's Priorities
If you've enabled the Personal Assistant, you'll see AI-suggested priorities ordered by what matters most to you.

---

## Tips for a Powerful Dashboard

1. **Check it daily** - Even a 30-second glance keeps you connected
2. **Log consistently** - The more data you provide, the smarter your insights
3. **Enable AI features** - Turn on the Personal Assistant for maximum value
4. **Click the tiles** - Each stat is a direct link to that feature

---

## Related Features
- **Personal Assistant** - Get AI-powered daily priorities and guidance
- **Journal** - Your entries power mood and pattern analysis
- **Health Tracking** - Feeds weight, nutrition, and vital trends

fields.title: Navigating Your Whole Life Journey
fields.description: Master the app layout and discover how everything connects.
fields.content:
## Why Good Navigation Matters

Whole Life Journey brings together many aspects of your lifeâ€”journal, health, faith, goals, and more. Understanding the layout helps you **capture thoughts quickly** when inspiration strikes and **find information easily** when you need it.

---

## The Big Picture: How It All Connects

Think of Whole Life Journey as a **personal life operating system**:

| Module | What You Log | What the AI Learns |
|--------|--------------|--------------------|
| **Journal** | Thoughts, moods, reflections | Emotional patterns, triggers |
| **Health** | Weight, nutrition, medicine, vitals | Physical trends, adherence |
| **Faith** | Prayers, scripture, milestones | Spiritual journey, answered prayers |
| **Life** | Tasks, projects, events | Productivity patterns |
| **Purpose** | Goals, intentions, directions | What matters most to you |

**Everything feeds into your Dashboard**, where AI turns raw data into actionable insights.

---

## Main Navigation

### Top Navigation Bar
- **Dashboard** - Your daily home base with insights
- **Journal** - Record thoughts and track moods
- **Faith** - Prayers, scripture, spiritual growth (if enabled)
- **Health** - Weight, nutrition, medicine, vitals, fitness
- **Life** - Tasks, projects, events, documents
- **Purpose** - Goals, annual direction, change intentions
- **Scan** ðŸ“· - Camera scan for food, medicine, documents

### User Menu (Avatar Icon)
Click your profile picture in the top-right:
- **Profile** - Your account information
- **Preferences** - Customize themes, modules, AI settings
- **What's New** - Recent feature updates
- **Sign Out** - Log out securely

### Help Icon (?)
Available on every pageâ€”click for context-specific guidance.

---

## Mobile Navigation

On phones and tablets:
1. Tap the **â˜° menu icon** to open the navigation drawer
2. All modules are accessible from the drawer
3. Swipe to close or tap outside

---

## Tips for Efficient Navigation

1. **Use Dashboard tiles** - Click the stat tiles for direct access
2. **Bookmark the Dashboard** - Make it your browser home page
3. **Enable only what you need** - Disable unused modules in Preferences
4. **Use keyboard shortcuts** - Press `?` to open help on any page

fields.title: Journal: The Foundation of Self-Awareness
fields.description: Your journal entries power AI insights about your emotional patterns and life rhythms.
fields.content:
## Why Journaling Changes Everything

Your journal isn't just a diaryâ€”it's the **primary data source for your AI insights**. Every entry you write teaches the system about:

- **Your emotional patterns** - When do you feel best? What triggers stress?
- **Your life rhythms** - Busy seasons, restful periods, recurring challenges
- **Your growth** - How far you've come, patterns you've broken
- **Your values** - What you write about reveals what matters

### The Dashboard Connection

When you journal consistently:
- Your **Daily Insight** becomes more personalized and relevant
- The AI notices **mood trends** you might miss
- Your **Journal Streak** tile celebrates consistency
- The Personal Assistant can suggest **reflection prompts** based on your patterns

---

## How to Use the Journal

### Creating an Entry
1. Click **"New Entry"** from the Journal page
2. Enter a title (or leave blank for auto-date title)
3. Select your current **mood** from the dropdown
4. Write your thoughts in the body field
5. (Optional) Add **categories** to organize entries
6. Click **"Save"** to create your entry

### Mood Tracking
Selecting your mood with each entry enables:
- Mood trend charts over time
- AI insights about what affects your emotional state
- Pattern detection (e.g., "You tend to feel anxious on Mondays")

### Viewing Past Entries
- Entries display newest first by default
- Click any title to read the full entry
- Use the calendar view to browse by date
- Filter by mood or category to find specific entries

---

## Tips for Powerful Journaling

1. **Write at the same time daily** - Morning or evening, consistency builds the habit
2. **Don't aim for perfection** - Even three sentences count toward your streak
3. **Be honest** - The AI learns from authentic entries, not polished ones
4. **Review monthly** - Read old entries to see your own growth
5. **Use prompts** - The Personal Assistant can suggest what to write about

---

## What Your Journal Teaches the AI

| What You Write | What the AI Learns |
|----------------|--------------------|
| Daily moods | Emotional patterns over time |
| Challenges mentioned | Recurring struggles to address |
| Wins and gratitude | What brings you joy |
| Goals referenced | Progress toward intentions |
| Relationships mentioned | Who matters in your life |

---

## Related Features
- **Dashboard** - See your journal streak and mood-based insights
- **Personal Assistant** - Get personalized journaling prompts
- **Purpose** - Connect journal reflections to your life goals

fields.title: Health: Track What You Can Measure
fields.description: Your health data powers trend analysis and helps you make informed decisions.
fields.content:
## Why Track Your Health?

**What gets measured gets managed.** The Health module helps you:

- **See trends** you can't feel day-to-day (gradual weight changes, blood pressure patterns)
- **Stay accountable** to your health goals with visual progress
- **Inform conversations** with your doctor using real data
- **Receive smart insights** as the AI notices patterns in your health data

### The Dashboard Connection

Your health data appears on your Dashboard as:
- **Weight progress** toward your goal (if set)
- **Nutrition summary** showing calories and macros
- **Medicine tracker** with today's doses
- **Fitness count** for the week
- **AI nudges** when you haven't logged in a while

---

## Health Sub-Modules

### Weight Tracking
**Why:** See long-term trends, not daily fluctuations
- Log weight with optional notes
- View progress charts over weeks/months
- Set a goal weight in Preferences
- AI notices trends and plateaus

### Nutrition / Food Tracking
**Why:** Understand what you eat, hit your macro goals
- Log meals with calories and macros
- Use Camera Scan for instant food logging
- Track meal timing and eating pace
- Set calorie and macro goals in Preferences

### Medicine Tracking
**Why:** Never miss a dose, track adherence over time
- Set up your medication schedule
- One-tap daily check-off
- See adherence percentages
- Get refill alerts before you run out

### Vitals (Blood Pressure & SpO2)
**Why:** Monitor cardiovascular health between doctor visits
- Log readings with context (resting, morning, etc.)
- Automatic categorization (normal, elevated, high)
- See trends over time

### Fasting
**Why:** Track intermittent fasting windows
- Start/end fasting with one tap
- View fasting history and patterns
- Track your fasting streaks

### Fitness / Workouts
**Why:** Build exercise consistency
- Log workouts with type and duration
- Use templates for common routines
- Track weekly workout counts

### Medical Providers
**Why:** Keep all your healthcare contacts organized
- Store doctor/clinic contact info
- AI-assisted provider lookup
- Track staff and portal access

---

## Tips for Better Health Tracking

1. **Log at the same time daily** - Morning weigh-ins, evening food reviews
2. **Use Camera Scan** - Photograph meals for quick logging
3. **Set realistic goals** - In Preferences, set targets you'll actually hit
4. **Check your trends** - Weekly patterns matter more than daily numbers
5. **Enable SMS reminders** - Get medicine reminders via text

---

## Related Features
- **Camera Scan** - Photograph food for instant nutrition logging
- **Dashboard** - See today's health summary at a glance
- **Personal Assistant** - Get health-related priorities and nudges
- **Preferences** - Set weight and nutrition goals

fields.title: Faith: Nurture Your Spiritual Journey
fields.description: Track prayers, scripture, and spiritual milestones to see God's faithfulness over time.
fields.content:
## Why Track Your Faith Journey?

Faith isn't just about the present momentâ€”it's about **seeing God's faithfulness over time**. The Faith module helps you:

- **Remember answered prayers** you might otherwise forget
- **Track spiritual growth** through milestones and reflections
- **Build consistency** in scripture reading and prayer
- **See patterns** in your spiritual life the AI can surface

### The Dashboard Connection

With Faith enabled, your Dashboard shows:
- **Active Prayer count** - Quick access to your prayer list
- **Faith-based insights** - AI considers your spiritual journey in daily insights
- **Faith-first priorities** - The Personal Assistant prioritizes faith over other areas
- **Answered prayer celebrations** - Recognition when God responds

---

## Faith Features

### Prayer Requests
**Why:** Never forget what you're praying forâ€”and celebrate when God answers

1. Click **"New Prayer"** to add a request
2. Set priority (Normal or Urgent)
3. Mark as **Answered** when God responds
4. View your history of answered prayers

**The power of tracking:** Months later, review your answered prayers. You'll be amazed at God's faithfulness in ways you forgot.

### Scripture
**Why:** Save verses that speak to you for easy reference

- Search for verses by reference
- Save favorites with personal notes
- Organize by topic or theme
- Review during difficult times

### Faith Milestones
**Why:** Mark the moments that shaped your faith journey

Record significant spiritual moments:
- Salvation experience
- Baptism
- Answered prayers
- Spiritual insights
- Community moments
- Ministry experiences

---

## How Faith Integrates with the AI

When faith is enabled, the Personal Assistant:
- **Prioritizes faith first** - Spiritual matters appear before other priorities
- **Suggests prayer time** - Gentle reminders to connect with God
- **Notices patterns** - When you haven't prayed or read scripture in a while
- **Celebrates faithfulness** - Acknowledges spiritual consistency

---

## Tips for Spiritual Growth

1. **Log prayers as you pray them** - Don't wait until later
2. **Update prayer status promptly** - Mark answered when it happens
3. **Review answered prayers monthly** - Build your faith by remembering
4. **Connect journal to faith** - Reflect spiritually in your journal entries
5. **Enable SMS reminders** - Get daily prayer reminders

---

## Related Features
- **Journal** - Write about spiritual experiences
- **Personal Assistant** - Faith-first daily priorities
- **SMS Notifications** - Daily prayer reminders via text
- **Dashboard** - Active prayer count and faith insights

fields.title: Preferences: Make It Yours
fields.description: Customize your experience, set goals, and control how the AI interacts with you.
fields.content:
## Why Preferences Matter

Whole Life Journey adapts to YOU, not the other way around. Your Preferences control:

- **What you see** - Enable only the modules you'll actually use
- **How it looks** - Choose themes and colors that inspire you
- **How the AI talks** - Pick a coaching style that motivates you
- **Your goals** - Set weight, nutrition, and other targets
- **Your notifications** - Control SMS reminders and alerts

### The More You Customize, The Better It Works

Setting clear goals in Preferences means:
- Your Dashboard shows **progress toward YOUR targets**
- The AI gives you **relevant, personalized insights**
- You stay focused on **what matters to you**

---

## Preference Categories

### Theme & Appearance
**Why:** Work in an environment that inspires you

- **Theme** - Choose from Minimal, Faith, Sports, Nature, Outdoors
- **Accent Color** - Pick a custom highlight color
- **Dark/Light Mode** - Follows your system or set manually

### Module Toggles
**Why:** Only see what's relevant to your life

Enable or disable:
- Journal
- Faith (prayers, scripture, milestones)
- Health (weight, nutrition, medicine, vitals)
- Life (tasks, projects, events)
- Purpose (goals, directions)

Disabled modules disappear from navigation.

### AI Settings
**Why:** Get insights that actually help you

- **Enable AI** - Turn on intelligent insights across the app
- **Coaching Style** - How the AI communicates with you:
  - Supportive Partner (warm, encouraging)
  - Direct Coach (brief, action-focused)
  - Gentle Guide (patient, nurturing)
  - Wise Mentor (thoughtful, reflective)
  - Cheerful Friend (upbeat, positive)
  - Calm Companion (steady, peaceful)
  - Accountability Partner (motivating, focused)

### Personal Assistant
**Why:** Get daily priorities and proactive guidance

- **Enable Personal Assistant** - Adds the Assistant to your navigation
- **Consent** - The Assistant needs deeper data access for personalization

### Weight & Nutrition Goals
**Why:** Track progress toward specific targets

- **Target Weight** - Your goal weight with optional deadline
- **Daily Calories** - Your calorie target
- **Macro Split** - Protein/Carbs/Fat percentages
- Presets: Balanced, High Protein, Low Carb, Keto

### SMS Notifications
**Why:** Get reminders where you'll see them

- **Verify Phone** - Add and verify your phone number
- **Categories** - Choose which reminders you want
- **Quiet Hours** - No texts during sleep

### Timezone & Location
**Why:** Accurate times and local context

- Set your timezone for correct streak tracking
- Location enables weather-aware insights

---

## Tips for Optimal Settings

1. **Start with fewer modules** - Add more as you build the habit
2. **Try different coaching styles** - Change it up if one doesn't resonate
3. **Set realistic goals** - Better to exceed than constantly fall short
4. **Enable the Personal Assistant** - It's the most powerful feature
5. **Use SMS reminders** - Texts are harder to ignore than app badges

fields.title: Life: Your Daily Operating Layer
fields.description: Manage the practical stuffâ€”tasks, projects, eventsâ€”so nothing falls through the cracks.
fields.content:
## Why Use the Life Module?

The Life module is where **intentions become action**. While Purpose holds your big-picture goals, Life holds the daily tasks that move you toward them. The connection matters:

- **Tasks completed** feed into your Dashboard productivity stats
- **Overdue tasks** trigger AI accountability nudges
- **Project progress** shows in your weekly trend analysis
- **Events** integrate with SMS reminders so you never miss important dates

### The Dashboard Connection

Your Life data powers:
- **Tasks Today** tile showing your daily count
- **Overdue task nudges** in your accountability section
- **Productivity patterns** the AI tracks weekly
- **Event reminders** via SMS if enabled

---

## Life Features

### Tasks
**Why:** Capture everything so your brain can relax

1. Click **"New Task"** to create a task
2. Set a title and optional description
3. Choose priority: Now, Soon, or Later
4. Add due date for time-sensitive items
5. Link to a project if part of larger work

**Priority levels:**
- **Now** - Do today
- **Soon** - This week
- **Later** - Someday

### Projects
**Why:** Break complex work into manageable pieces

1. Click **"New Project"** to create a project
2. Set status: Active, Paused, or Completed
3. Add tasks that belong to this project
4. Track progress as tasks complete

**Project-Task connection:** Completing project tasks updates your overall project progress automatically.

### Events
**Why:** Never miss important dates

- Add events with dates and times
- Set location and notes
- View your week at a glance
- Get SMS reminders 30 minutes before

### Additional Features

- **Inventory** - Track your belongings and their locations
- **Pets** - Manage pet records, vet visits, care schedules
- **Recipes** - Save your favorite recipes
- **Documents** - Store important document references

---

## How Life Connects to Purpose

The ideal flow:
1. Set **Annual Direction** in Purpose (your word/theme for the year)
2. Create **Goals** that align with that direction
3. Break goals into **Projects** in Life
4. Break projects into **Tasks**
5. Complete tasks daily â†’ Projects complete â†’ Goals achieved â†’ Direction fulfilled

The AI sees this entire chain and helps keep you aligned.

---

## Tips for Task Management

1. **Do a daily review** - Check your task list each morning
2. **Use the Now/Soon/Later system** - Don't over-prioritize
3. **Link tasks to projects** - See the bigger picture
4. **Complete tasks promptly** - Don't let the list grow stale
5. **Enable task SMS reminders** - Get due date notifications

---

## Related Features
- **Purpose** - Your goals that tasks support
- **Dashboard** - Today's task count and productivity patterns
- **Personal Assistant** - Task-related priorities
- **SMS Notifications** - Task due date reminders

fields.title: Purpose: Your North Star
fields.description: Define what matters most so your daily actions align with your deeper values.
fields.content:
## Why Purpose Matters Most

Purpose is the **anchor** for everything else in Whole Life Journey. Without it, you're just logging data. With it, every task, journal entry, and health metric connects to **what you actually want from life**.

### The AI Connection

When you set Purpose content, the AI can:
- **Detect drift** - Notice when your actions don't match your stated intentions
- **Prioritize wisely** - Suggest priorities aligned with your goals
- **Celebrate alignment** - Acknowledge when you're living your purpose
- **Ask better questions** - Generate journal prompts connected to your direction

---

## Purpose Features

### Annual Direction
**Why:** Give your year focus and meaning

1. **Word of the Year** - A single guiding word (e.g., "Growth", "Peace", "Discipline")
2. **Core Theme** - What you want to accomplish this year
3. **Focus Areas** - Key life domains to prioritize

**Review quarterly** to ensure you're still on track.

### Life Goals
**Why:** Define what success looks like

1. Click **"New Goal"** to create a goal
2. Add milestones to break it into steps
3. Track progress as you advance
4. Link to projects and tasks in the Life module

**Goal categories:**
- Health & Wellness
- Personal Growth
- Relationships
- Career
- Financial
- Spiritual

### Change Intentions
**Why:** Capture what you want to improve

- Record areas for personal growth
- Set intentions for positive change
- Review periodically for accountability

---

## How Purpose Powers the AI

| What You Set | How the AI Uses It |
|--------------|--------------------|
| Word of the Year | References it in daily insights |
| Goals | Prioritizes related tasks |
| Change Intentions | Watches for drift |
| Focus Areas | Filters what matters |

---

## The Purpose Cascade

```
Annual Direction (the "why")
    â†“
Life Goals (the "what")
    â†“
Projects (the "how", in Life module)
    â†“
Tasks (the daily "do")
```

The AI understands this hierarchy and helps you stay connected from daily tasks to yearly purpose.

---

## Tips for Purposeful Living

1. **Set your Annual Direction first** - Everything else flows from this
2. **Limit to 3-5 goals** - Focus beats breadth
3. **Review monthly** - Are you moving toward your purpose?
4. **Connect to Life module** - Create projects and tasks from goals
5. **Journal about purpose** - Reflect on alignment regularly

---

## Related Features
- **Life** - Tasks and projects that execute your purpose
- **Journal** - Reflect on purpose alignment
- **Personal Assistant** - Drift detection and goal reminders
- **Dashboard** - Goal progress and purpose-aligned insights

fields.title: Your Profile
fields.description: View and manage your account information and activity summary.
fields.content:
## Your Profile

Your profile is your account identity in Whole Life Journey.

### Profile Information

Your profile displays:
- **Name** - How you appear throughout the app
- **Email** - Your login address
- **Avatar** - Your profile picture
- **Member since** - When you joined

### Activity Summary

Quick stats show your overall engagement:
- Total journal entries
- Prayer requests (if Faith enabled)
- Health measurements logged
- Tasks completed

### Editing Your Profile

Click **"Edit Profile"** to update:
- Your display name
- Email address
- Profile picture

### Account Security

- Use **Preferences > Security** for biometric login (Face ID/Touch ID)
- To change your password, use the password reset option from the login page
- Your data is stored securely and never shared

fields.title: Admin Console Overview
fields.description: Manage your Whole Life Journey site settings and users.
fields.content:
## Admin Console

The Admin Console is the management hub for site-wide settings.

### Quick Stats

The dashboard shows:
- Total users
- Total journal entries
- Active themes
- Categories defined

### Management Sections

**Site Configuration** - Branding, registration, default settings

**Themes** - Create and customize visual themes

**Categories** - Manage content organization

**Users** - View and manage accounts

**Choice Categories** - Define dropdown options

**Help Topics** - Manage help content

### Django Admin

For advanced database access, click **"Django Admin"** to access the full interface.

fields.title: Site Configuration
fields.description: Configure site-wide settings, branding, and defaults.
fields.content:
## Site Configuration

Control your site's appearance and behavior.

### Branding
- **Site Name** - Browser title and headers
- **Tagline** - Landing page message
- **Logo** - Custom logo (200x64 recommended)
- **Favicon** - Browser tab icon (32x32 PNG)

### Registration Settings
- **Allow Registration** - Enable/disable signups
- **Require Email Verification** - Force email confirmation
- **Faith Enabled by Default** - New user Faith module setting

### Default Theme
Select the theme new users see initially.

### Footer & Legal
- Footer text and copyright
- Privacy Policy URL
- Terms of Service URL

### Saving Changes
Click **Save Configuration** - changes apply immediately.

fields.title: Theme Management
fields.description: Create and customize visual themes for your site.
fields.content:
## Theme Management

Themes control the visual appearance of your site.

### Theme Properties
- **Name** - Displayed in preferences
- **Slug** - Unique identifier
- **Description** - Style description
- **Sort Order** - Display position

### Color Settings

Each theme has light and dark mode colors:

**Primary Colors:** Primary, Secondary, Accent

**Text Colors:** Text, Text Muted

**Background Colors:** Background, Surface, Border

### Creating a Theme
1. Click **"Add Theme"**
2. Fill in name, slug, description
3. Set all hex color values (#ffffff)
4. Check **Active** for availability
5. Click **Save**

### Tips
- Test in both light and dark mode
- Ensure good contrast for accessibility
- Preview before activating

fields.title: User Management
fields.description: View and manage user accounts.
fields.content:
## User Management

View and manage all user accounts.

### User List
Shows name, email, staff status, join date, last login.

### User Details
Click a user to view account info, activity stats, and preferences.

### Staff Status
Staff users can access Admin Console and Django Admin.

### Creating Users
Use Django Admin for new admin accounts.

### Security Notes
- Only grant staff to trusted users
- Review user activity periodically
- Enforce strong passwords

fields.title: Nutrition: Fuel Your Body Intentionally
fields.description: Track what you eat to understand your patterns and hit your macro goals.
fields.content:
## Why Track Nutrition?

You can't manage what you don't measure. Nutrition tracking helps you:

- **Understand your patterns** - When do you overeat? Undereat protein?
- **Hit your goals** - See exactly where you stand on calories and macros
- **Identify triggers** - Connect eating habits to mood, stress, and time of day
- **Make informed choices** - Know the impact before you eat

### The Dashboard Connection

Your nutrition data powers:
- **Today's Nutrition** summary with calorie and macro progress
- **AI insights** about eating patterns
- **Personal Assistant** nudges when you're off-target
- **Trend analysis** showing weekly and monthly patterns

---

## How to Log Food

### Method 1: Camera Scan (Fastest)
1. Click **Scan** in the navigation
2. Point camera at your food or nutrition label
3. AI identifies the food and estimates nutrition
4. Review and save the pre-filled entry

### Method 2: Quick Add
1. From Nutrition page, click **"Quick Add"**
2. Enter food name and basics (calories at minimum)
3. Save quickly without full detail

### Method 3: Full Entry
1. Click **"Add Food Entry"**
2. Fill in all nutritional details
3. Add meal type, location, eating pace
4. Include hunger/fullness levels for mindful eating

---

## Tracking Details

### Meal Types
- Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snack

### Location Context
- Home, Restaurant, Work, Travel, Other

### Eating Pace
- Rushed, Normal, Slow/Mindful

### Hunger & Fullness
- 1-5 scale to build mindful eating awareness

---

## Setting Nutrition Goals

In **Preferences > Weight & Nutrition Goals**:

1. **Daily Calorie Goal** - Your target intake
2. **Macro Split** - Protein/Carbs/Fat percentages
3. Use presets: Balanced, High Protein, Low Carb, Keto

Once set, your Dashboard shows progress bars for each.

---

## Tips for Successful Tracking

1. **Log before you eat** - Easier than remembering later
2. **Use Camera Scan** - AI does the work for packaged foods
3. **Don't aim for perfection** - Close estimates beat no data
4. **Review weekly trends** - Daily variation is normal
5. **Create custom foods** - Save your common meals for quick logging

---

## Related Features
- **Camera Scan** - Photograph food for instant logging
- **Dashboard** - Today's nutrition summary
- **Preferences** - Set calorie and macro goals
- **Personal Assistant** - Nutrition-related priorities

fields.title: Medicine Tracking: Never Miss a Dose
fields.description: Track your medications, monitor adherence, and get refill reminders.
fields.content:
## Why Track Medicine?

Medication adherence is one of the most impactful health behaviorsâ€”and one of the hardest to maintain. Medicine tracking helps you:

- **Never miss a dose** - Visual schedules and SMS reminders
- **Build consistency** - See your adherence rate over time
- **Catch refill needs early** - Alerts before you run out
- **Inform your doctor** - Share accurate adherence data at appointments

### The Dashboard Connection

Your medicine data appears on your Dashboard as:
- **Medicine Doses** tile with today's status
- **Adherence insights** from the AI
- **Refill alerts** in the nudges section
- **Trend analysis** in weekly reports

---

## Setting Up Medicines

### Adding a Medicine
1. Go to **Health > Medicine**
2. Click **"Add Medicine"**
3. Enter: Name, dose, frequency
4. Set schedule: days and times
5. Add doctor and pharmacy (optional)
6. Set refill alert threshold

### Schedule Options
- **Daily** - Same times every day
- **Specific days** - Weekly medications
- **PRN (As Needed)** - Track when you take it

---

## Daily Tracking

### One-Tap Check-Off
1. Visit **Health > Medicine** each day
2. See today's schedule with status badges
3. Tap to mark as **Taken**, **Missed**, or **Skipped**

### Status Badges
- ðŸŸ¢ **Taken** - Dose completed
- ðŸŸ¡ **Pending** - Not yet due
- ðŸ”´ **Overdue** - Past due time
- âšª **Skipped** - Intentionally skipped

### SMS Reminders
Enable in **Preferences > SMS Notifications**:
- Get text reminders at scheduled times
- Reply **D** for Done, **R** for Remind Me, **N** for Skip
- Log doses directly from text messages

---

## Refill Tracking

### Setting Up Refill Alerts
1. Enter **current quantity** and **pills per dose**
2. System calculates days remaining
3. Alert triggers at your set threshold

### Refill Request Tracking
1. When low, click **"Request Refill"**
2. Status changes to "Refill Requested"
3. Dashboard shows pending refill
4. When received, click **"Refill Received"**

---

## Adherence Tracking

### View Your Adherence
- **Daily view** - Today's completion rate
- **Weekly view** - 7-day adherence percentage
- **Monthly view** - Long-term consistency
- **By medicine** - See which meds you miss most

### Quick Look
Click **"Quick Look"** for a screenshot-friendly view of your medicine listâ€”great for sharing with doctors.

---

## Tips for Better Adherence

1. **Enable SMS reminders** - Text messages are harder to ignore
2. **Use consistent times** - Same time each day builds habit
3. **Log immediately** - Don't wait until later
4. **Review weekly** - Identify patterns in missed doses
5. **Pause when needed** - Pause medications without losing history

---

## Related Features
- **SMS Notifications** - Medicine reminders via text
- **Dashboard** - Today's medicine status
- **Camera Scan** - Photograph medicine bottles to add
- **Personal Assistant** - Medicine-related priorities

fields.title: Camera Scan: AI-Powered Quick Entry
fields.description: Photograph items to instantly log food, medicine, documents, and more.
fields.content:
## Why Use Camera Scan?

Camera Scan removes the friction from logging. Instead of typing nutritional data or medicine names, just **point and shoot**:

- **Food/Nutrition** - Photograph meals or nutrition labels for instant macro entry
- **Medicine** - Scan bottles to add medications
- **Documents** - Capture important papers
- **Receipts** - Log expenses quickly

### The Time Savings

Manual food entry: 2-3 minutes per meal
Camera scan: 10 seconds

Over a week, that's **30+ minutes saved** on food logging alone.

---

## How to Use Camera Scan

### Taking a Photo
1. Click **Scan** in the main navigation
2. Grant camera permission if prompted
3. Point at your item (food, medicine, document)
4. Tap **capture** or use file upload
5. Wait for AI analysis (2-5 seconds)

### What the AI Detects

| Item Type | What Happens |
|-----------|-------------|
| **Packaged Food** | Identifies brand, looks up nutrition facts |
| **Home-Cooked Food** | Estimates portions and macros |
| **Nutrition Label** | Reads and extracts all data |
| **Medicine Bottle** | Extracts name, dose, pharmacy |
| **Document** | Categorizes and offers to save |
| **Receipt** | Extracts items and totals |

### After Analysis

You'll see:
- What the AI identified
- Pre-filled form with extracted data
- Suggested actions (log food, add medicine, etc.)
- Option to edit before saving

---

## Food Recognition Details

### For Packaged Foods
- AI identifies brand and product name
- Looks up actual nutritional data
- Returns calories, protein, carbs, fat, fiber, sugar
- Includes standard serving size

### For Home-Cooked/Restaurant Food
- AI estimates portion size visually
- Uses nutritional databases for identified ingredients
- Considers visible preparation methods
- Estimates are good approximations, not exact

---

## Tips for Best Results

1. **Good lighting** - Natural light works best
2. **Clear focus** - Make sure text is readable
3. **Include labels** - Nutrition facts labels give best accuracy
4. **Whole plate visible** - For portion estimation
5. **Steady hand** - Avoid blur

---

## Privacy & Security

- **No permanent storage** - Images are processed and deleted
- **Encrypted transmission** - Your photos are secure
- **No sharing** - Data stays in your account only
- **Optional** - You can always use manual entry instead

---

## Related Features
- **Nutrition Tracking** - Where food scans end up
- **Medicine Tracking** - Where medicine scans end up
- **Dashboard** - See logged data in your daily view
- **AI Settings** - Camera scan requires AI to be enabled

fields.title: Personal Assistant: Your AI-Powered Guide
fields.description: Get daily priorities, trend analysis, and proactive guidance based on your data.
fields.content:
## Why Use the Personal Assistant?

The Personal Assistant isn't a chatbot or cheerleaderâ€”it's a **task-focused guide** that helps you take action. Unlike the Dashboard (which shows data), the Assistant tells you **what to do next**.

### What Makes It Different

| Dashboard | Personal Assistant |
|-----------|---------|
| Shows your data | Interprets your data |
| Celebrates wins | Focuses on gaps |
| Passive display | Proactive suggestions |
| General insights | Specific priorities |

---

## Personal Assistant Features

### Daily Priorities
Each morning, the Assistant analyzes your data and suggests:
1. What needs attention today
2. Ordered by importance (faith first, then purpose, then maintenance)
3. Completable with one click

### Opening Message
A brief daily check-in that:
- Acknowledges your current state
- Highlights what matters today
- Sets the tone based on your coaching style

### Trend Analysis
- **Weekly Analysis** - Patterns from the last 7 days
- **Monthly Analysis** - Bigger-picture trends
- **Drift Detection** - When your actions don't match your intentions

### Reflection Prompts
Personalized journaling suggestions based on:
- Your recent activity
- Gaps in your tracking
- Goals you've set
- Patterns the AI notices

---

## Priority Ordering (Faith-First)

If you have Faith enabled, priorities follow this order:

1. **Faith** - Prayer, scripture, spiritual practices
2. **Purpose** - Goals and annual direction
3. **Long-term goals** - Active goal milestones
4. **Commitments** - Tasks and events
5. **Maintenance** - Health tracking, routines
6. **Optional** - Nice-to-haves

This ensures what matters most gets attention first.

---

## Using the Assistant

### Viewing Priorities
1. Click **Assistant** in the navigation
2. See today's priorities with action buttons
3. Click to complete, dismiss, or get details

### Chatting
- Ask questions about your data
- Get clarification on priorities
- Request analysis of specific areas

### Completing Priorities
- Click âœ“ when done
- Priority marked complete (not regenerated today)
- Contributes to completion stats

---

## Enabling the Personal Assistant

The Assistant requires extra consent because it accesses more of your data:

1. Go to **Preferences > AI Settings**
2. Enable **AI Features** if not already
3. Enable **Personal Assistant**
4. Accept the consent for deeper data access
5. Assistant link appears in navigation

---

## What the Assistant Sees

To provide useful guidance, the Assistant analyzes:
- Journal entries and mood patterns
- Health data and adherence rates
- Task completion and overdue items
- Prayer requests and faith activity
- Goal progress and drift from intentions

**This is why separate consent is required.**

---

## Tips for Getting Value

1. **Check it daily** - Morning review of priorities
2. **Complete promptly** - Mark done when you finish
3. **Log consistently** - Better data = better suggestions
4. **Set clear Purpose** - The AI needs to know your intentions
5. **Read weekly analysis** - Big-picture patterns are revealing

---

## Related Features
- **Dashboard** - Where insights appear
- **Purpose** - Your goals that drive priorities
- **Journal** - Reflection prompts link here
- **Preferences** - Enable/configure the Assistant

fields.title: SMS Notifications: Reminders Where You'll See Them
fields.description: Get text message reminders for medicines, tasks, events, and more.
fields.content:
## Why SMS Notifications?

App notifications are easy to ignore. Text messages aren't. SMS notifications ensure you:

- **Never miss a medicine dose** - Texts arrive at scheduled times
- **Stay on top of tasks** - Due date reminders via text
- **Remember events** - 30-minute advance notice
- **Can respond quickly** - Reply to log without opening the app

### The Quick Reply System

When you get a medicine reminder, reply:
- **D** (Done) - Mark taken immediately
- **R** (Remind) - Get another reminder in 5 minutes
- **N** (No/Skip) - Skip this dose

No app needed. Just text back.

---

## Setting Up SMS

### Step 1: Add Your Phone
1. Go to **Preferences > SMS Notifications**
2. Enter your phone number
3. Click **"Send Verification Code"**
4. Enter the 6-digit code you receive
5. Phone is now verified

### Step 2: Enable SMS
1. Toggle **"Enable SMS Notifications"** on
2. Accept the SMS consent

### Step 3: Choose Categories
Select which reminders you want:
- âœ… Medicine reminders
- âœ… Medicine refill alerts
- âœ… Task due date reminders
- âœ… Event reminders
- âœ… Prayer reminders (if Faith enabled)
- âœ… Fasting reminders

### Step 4: Set Quiet Hours
No texts during sleep:
- Set start time (e.g., 10:00 PM)
- Set end time (e.g., 7:00 AM)
- Reminders queue until quiet hours end

---

## Notification Types

| Type | When Sent | Example |
|------|-----------|----------|
| Medicine | At scheduled time | "Time for Metformin. Reply D/R/N" |
| Refill Alert | When supply low | "Low supply: Metformin (3 days left)" |
| Task Due | On due date | "Due today: Buy groceries" |
| Event | 30 min before | "In 30 min: Doctor appt" |
| Prayer | Morning | "Take a moment for prayer today" |
| Fasting | Window times | "Eating window opens at noon" |

---

## Reply Codes

| You Text | What Happens |
|----------|-------------|
| D, done, yes, taken | Mark complete |
| R, R5, R10, R30 | Remind in X minutes |
| N, no, skip | Skip/dismiss |

Codes are case-insensitive.

---

## Costs

SMS is a premium feature with real carrier costs:
- Outbound: ~$0.008/message
- Inbound: ~$0.008/message

**Example:** 3 medicine reminders/day = ~$0.72/month

Your site admin manages the Twilio account.

---

## Tips for Best Use

1. **Start with medicine only** - Most impactful category
2. **Set appropriate quiet hours** - Avoid late-night texts
3. **Use reply codes** - Faster than opening the app
4. **Check SMS history** - View all sent messages in app

---

## Related Features
- **Medicine Tracking** - Primary use case for SMS
- **Life Events** - Event reminders via SMS
- **Preferences** - Configure all SMS settings
- **Faith** - Daily prayer reminders

fields.title: Vitals: Monitor Your Cardiovascular Health
fields.description: Track blood pressure and blood oxygen to spot trends between doctor visits.
fields.content:
## Why Track Vitals?

Vitals like blood pressure and blood oxygen change gradually. By tracking them yourself, you can:

- **Catch trends early** - Gradual changes are hard to feel
- **Prepare for appointments** - Bring real data to your doctor
- **Understand your patterns** - Morning vs evening, resting vs stressed
- **Get categorization** - Know if readings are normal, elevated, or concerning

### The Dashboard Connection

Your vitals data appears on:
- **Health home page** - Latest readings with category badges
- **AI insights** - Patterns and trends over time
- **Personal Assistant** - Alerts for concerning readings

---

## Blood Pressure Tracking

### Logging a Reading
1. Go to **Health > Blood Pressure**
2. Click **"Log Reading"**
3. Enter systolic (top number) and diastolic (bottom number)
4. Add pulse if you know it
5. Select context (resting, morning, post-exercise, etc.)
6. Note which arm and your position
7. Save

### Categories (AHA Guidelines)

| Category | Systolic | Diastolic |
|----------|----------|-----------|
| ðŸŸ¢ Normal | <120 | AND <80 |
| ðŸŸ¡ Elevated | 120-129 | AND <80 |
| ðŸŸ  High Stage 1 | 130-139 | OR 80-89 |
| ðŸ”´ High Stage 2 | â‰¥140 | OR â‰¥90 |
| âš« Crisis | â‰¥180 | OR â‰¥120 |

### Context Options
- Resting, Morning, Evening
- Post-Exercise, Stressed, Relaxed
- At Doctor's Office

---

## Blood Oxygen (SpO2) Tracking

### Logging a Reading
1. Go to **Health > Blood Oxygen**
2. Click **"Log Reading"**
3. Enter SpO2 percentage
4. Add pulse if available
5. Select context and measurement method
6. Save

### Categories

| Category | SpO2 |
|----------|------|
| ðŸŸ¢ Normal | â‰¥95% |
| ðŸŸ¡ Low | 90-94% |
| ðŸŸ  Concerning | 85-89% |
| ðŸ”´ Critical | <85% |

### Measurement Methods
- Finger pulse oximeter
- Wrist device
- Ear clip
- Other

---

## Tips for Accurate Tracking

### Blood Pressure
1. **Sit quietly for 5 minutes** before measuring
2. **Same time daily** for comparable readings
3. **Arm at heart level** for accuracy
4. **Avoid caffeine/exercise** for 30 minutes before
5. **Take 2-3 readings** and log the average

### Blood Oxygen
1. **Warm hands** for better readings
2. **Remove nail polish** if using finger
3. **Stay still** during measurement
4. **Resting readings** are most useful for trends

---

## Related Features
- **Health Home** - Vitals cards with quick access
- **Dashboard** - AI notices concerning patterns
- **Medical Providers** - Share data with your doctor
- **Personal Assistant** - Vitals-related priorities

fields.title: Medical Providers: Your Healthcare Contacts
fields.description: Store doctor contacts, patient portal access, and staff information in one place.
fields.content:
## Why Store Provider Information?

When you need medical help, you want information fast. The Providers feature helps you:

- **Find contact info quickly** - No searching through papers
- **Access patient portals** - Stored URLs and usernames
- **Know your care team** - Track staff members you work with
- **Use AI lookup** - Let AI find provider details for you

---

## Adding a Provider

### Manual Entry
1. Go to **Health > Providers**
2. Click **"Add Provider"**
3. Enter name and specialty
4. Add contact info (phone, fax, address)
5. Add patient portal URL and username
6. Mark as primary care if applicable
7. Save

### AI-Assisted Lookup
1. Start adding a provider
2. Enter just the name and city/state
3. Click **"Search with AI"**
4. AI finds and pre-fills:
   - Phone and fax numbers
   - Full address
   - Website URL
   - Specialty and credentials
   - NPI number
5. Review and save

---

## Provider Information

### Contact Details
- Phone (primary and alternate)
- Fax number
- Email address
- Website
- Full address

### Practice Details
- Specialty (27 options)
- Credentials (MD, DO, PA-C, etc.)
- NPI number
- Insurance accepted

### Patient Portal
- Portal URL
- Username (not password - stored locally only)

### Staff Members
Add PAs, nurses, and staff you interact with:
- Name and role
- Direct phone/extension
- Email

---

## Specialties Available

Primary Care, Cardiology, Dentistry, Dermatology, Endocrinology, Gastroenterology, Neurology, OB/GYN, Oncology, Ophthalmology, Orthopedics, Pediatrics, Psychiatry, Pulmonology, Radiology, Rheumatology, Urology, Physical Therapy, Pharmacy, Lab/Imaging, Urgent Care, Emergency, Hospital, Specialist, Mental Health, Nutrition, Other

---

## Tips for Organization

1. **Mark your primary care** - Appears first and on Health home
2. **Add staff members** - Remember who you talked to
3. **Store portal URLs** - Direct links to patient portals
4. **Use AI lookup** - Faster than manual search
5. **Add notes** - Personal reminders about the practice

---

## Related Features
- **Medicine Tracking** - Link medicines to prescribing doctors
- **Health Home** - Primary provider quick access
- **Vitals** - Share data with providers
